description:
John Kelly is a Phoenix personal injury lawyer with a primary focus on car accidents in Arizona.

At the Kelly Law Team we understand the challenges you may face after suffering injuries due to the negligence of another. From their Phoenix, Arizona, law office, they offer personal injury representation to clients throughout Arizona. The firmâ€™s founding member, John Kelly, is committed to advocating on behalf of those who have been injured and collecting maximum compensation.

What to do if you have been injured?

After being injured in a car collision, or some other type of accident, you may be facing a range of challenges. These may include medical bills, lost income and adjustments you may have to make to your daily lifestyle. Mr. Kelly and his law office team are mindful of these challenges and strive to help you obtain compensation for the damages you have suffered.

When it comes to the circumstances that lead to personal injuries, Mr. Kelly knows that there is not a one-size-fits-all solution. For this reason, he will discuss your case with you in a free initial consultation, and then tailor his approach to your needs and develop his strategy based on your unique situation.

What to Expect if you hire John as your Personal Injury Lawyer

First you can expect personal attention and good communication. The objectives and expectations of your case will be clearly explained so you know what to expect. This attention will be provided throughout the litigation process as well as trial, if needed. Finally, John will work to ensure every possible avenue for compensation is explored.

Regardless of whether you have been told that there is no insurance coverage or that you cannot be compensated for your injuries, Mr. Kelly and his team will diligently investigate and pursue your case. They will leave no stone unturned in helping you achieve financial justice for your injuries.

Additional Practice Areas

In addition to car accident cases, our firm also handles the following cases:

Truck Accidents

Wrongful Death

Motorcycle Accidents

Assault

Dog Bites

Product Liability

Transvaginal Mesh

Invokana Lawsuits

Slip & Fall

Medical Malpractice

Premises Liability

Workers Compensation

Burn Injuries

Brain Injuries

IVC Filter Lawsuits

Bicycle Accidents

Pedestrian Accidents

Free Consultation- 24 Hours a Day

If you have been injured and are seeking compensation; please call us today for a free consultation.
